item.title: A couple questions i need help with
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

  1. Why doesn’t this case work, when i click “Pick Flax” it doesn’t do nowt.
case 2646:
if(actionTimer == 0) {
addItem(1779,1);
startAnimation(0x340);
sendMessage("You pick some flax...");
actionTimer = 20;
}
break;
  1. Where do i edit the buttons “Public Chat” and “Private Chat”?

Thankzzzzz.

Read full topic
item.source: A couple questions i need help with
